Kristinn Sigurdsson writes:
[...]
> Michael's suggestion of datamining the generated ARC files (compiled running
> an unmodified Heritrix) would get around the whole Java issue.

I will be releasing an updated version of my (C++) libarc library that
includes an application called "dumparc" that allows you to dump
individual members from the ARC file based on the URL.

You can, of course, use the library directly to mine the file: this
may be the solution to the problem: you can mine the ARC files without
mucking about extending Heritrix.

See http://www.sourceforge.net/projects/libarc.

We're closing on a house today, so I'm a bit distracted ;-). But I should
release the updated library sometime this weekend.

    -tree
